00016 class Huffman16
00017 {
00018 public:
00019     /* Huffman tree node. Implementation use only. */
00020     class HuffmanNode16
00021     {
00022     public:
00023         HuffmanNode16*  left;
00024         HuffmanNode16*  right;
00025         HuffmanNode16*  parent;
00026         int             value;
00027         int             code;
00028         int             count;
00029         int             level;
00030         int             depth;
00031         int             sortvalue;
00032         bool            ignore;
00033 
00034         HuffmanNode16();
00035         HuffmanNode16( HuffmanNode16* left0, HuffmanNode16* right0 );
00036     };
00037 
00038     /* Huffman tree node sorter. Uses sortvalue field to sort items in non-descending order. Implemetatino use only. */
00039     class HuffmanNodeSorter16
00040     {
00041     public:
00042         bool operator()( HuffmanNode16* a, HuffmanNode16* b ) const     {return a->sortvalue < b->sortvalue;}
00043     };
00044 
00045     Huffman16();
00046 
00047     ~Huffman16();
00048 
00052     void    buildTree( const uint16_t* data, int count );
00053 
00058     void    writeTree( Array<uint8_t>* treedata );
00059 
00064     int     readTree( const uint8_t* treedata, int treedatasize );
00065 
00069     void    compress( const uint16_t* data, int count, Array<uint8_t>* out );
00070 
00074     void    decompress( const uint8_t* data, int count, Array<uint16_t>* out );
00075 
00082     bool    encode( const uint16_t* data, int bytecount, Array<uint8_t>* out );
00083 
00090     void    decode( const uint8_t* data, int bitcount, Array<uint16_t>* out, int firstbit=0 );
00091 
00092 private:
00093     enum { MAX_LEVELS = 16 };
00094 
00095     Array<HuffmanNode16*>   m_huffmanArray;
00096     HuffmanNode16*          m_huffmanTree;
00097     Array<int>              m_startCodes;
00098     Array<int>              m_startIndices;
00099     Array<int>              m_levelCounts;
00100     Array<HuffmanNode16*>   m_encodingTable;
00101     Array<HuffmanNode16>    m_allocNodes;
00102     Array<HuffmanNode16*>   m_allocNodesPtr;
00103 
00104     HuffmanNode16*          buildTree( HuffmanNode16** nodes, int count );
00105     void                    assignCodes( Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& huffmanarray );
00106     void                    deleteTree();
00107 
00108     static int              findMinCountNode( HuffmanNode16** nodes, int count );
00109     static void             printTree( HuffmanNode16* node );
00110     static void             increaseLevel( HuffmanNode16* node );
00111     static void             getBitString( int x, int bitcount, char* buf );
00112     static void             getLeafNodes( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node, Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& huffmanarray );
00113     static void             getLeafNodesR( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node, Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& huffmanarray );
00114     static int              getHuffmanCode( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node );
00115     static void             assignNonCanonicalCodes( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node );
00116     static int              getUniqueLeafLevelCount( const Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& a );
00117     static void             getLinearTableByValue( const Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& src, Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& linear );
00118     static void             getLinearTableByCode( const Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& src, Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& linear );
00119     static int              getLevelCounts( Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& huffmanarray, Array<int>& levelcounts );
00120     static void             writeUInt8( Array<uint8_t>* out, int x )        {assert( x >= 0 && x < 0x100 ); out->add( (uint8_t)x );}
00121     static void             writeUInt16( Array<uint8_t>* out, int x )       {assert( x >= 0 && x < 0x10000 ); out->add( (uint8_t)x ); out->add( (uint8_t)(x>>8) );}
00122     static void             writeInt32( Array<uint8_t>* out, int x )        {out->add( (uint8_t)x ); out->add( (uint8_t)(x>>8) ); out->add( (uint8_t)(x>>16) ); out->add( (uint8_t)(x>>24) );}
00123     static int              readUInt8( const uint8_t*& readptr )            {return *readptr++;}
00124     static int              readUInt16( const uint8_t*& readptr )           {int x = int(readptr[0]) + (int(readptr[1])<<8); readptr += 2; return x;}
00125     static int              readInt32( const uint8_t*& readptr )            {int x = int(readptr[0]) + (int(readptr[1])<<8) + (int(readptr[2])<<16) + (int(readptr[3])<<24); readptr += 4; return x;}
00126     static void             printCodes( const Array<Huffman16::HuffmanNode16*>& huffmanarray );
00127     static void             updateDepth( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node, int level=0 );
00128     static int              getDepth( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node );
00129     static int              reverseBits( int x, int bitcount );
00130     static void             checkTree( Huffman16::HuffmanNode16* node );
00131 };
